name: John Hitchner
review: Pastor Claude is one of the best.  The congregation is filled with sincerity and diversity. If you want a place to comfortably study the word of God,  I highly recommend this church. It's not a mega church,  there aren't flashy lights; but if you want to learn you should come visit. All are welcome.

name: david timerson
review: The pastor is great,people are sincere and love to welcome guests,i highly recommend this church!

name: Robert Wright
review: Excellent preaching and solid teaching. Wonderful fellowship.
